mapper.select: SELECT c.*,d.*,p.*,de.*,m.* FROM consultation c join patient p on c.patient=p.id join doctor d on d.doctor_id = p.doctor join dept de on c.dept=de.dept_id join medicine m on c.medicine=m.medicine_id where c.status=0
